description: This file provides utility functions for mapping operations, including safe wrappers for the built-in map function, applying a function to iterables in various ways.

methods.name: list[U] apply_map(func: Callable[[T], U], items: Iterable[T])
methods.description: Apply a function over an iterable and return a list of results.

methods.name: Iterator[U] iter_map(func: Callable[[T], U], items: Iterable[T])
methods.description: Yield transformed items by mapping a function over an iterable.

methods.name: Iterator[U] builtin_map(func: Callable[[T], U], items: Iterable[T])
methods.description: Expose Python's built-in map as an iterator without shadowing.

ctags.name: apply_map
ctags.pattern: /^def apply_map(func: Callable[[T], U], items: Iterable[T]) -> list[U]:$/

ctags.name: builtin_map
ctags.pattern: /^def builtin_map(func: Callable[[T], U], items: Iterable[T]) -> Iterator[U]:$/

ctags.name: iter_map
ctags.pattern: /^def iter_map(func: Callable[[T], U], items: Iterable[T]) -> Iterator[U]:$/
